prompt:
select t1.teamname, t2.winner
from national_team as t1
         join world_cup as t2 on t1.team_id = t2.winner
where t2.year = 1954;
completion: Give me the winner of the world cup in 1954

prompt:
select t1.teamname
from national_team as t1
    join world_cup as t2 on t1.team_id = t2.winner
where t2.year = 2002;
completion: Who won the world cup in 2002?

prompt:
select nt.teamname
from world_cup
         join national_team as nt on world_cup.winner = nt.team_id
where nt.year = '2014';
completion: Which team is the winner of the world cup in 2014?

select capacity, stadium_name
from stadium
group by stadium_name, capacity
order by max(capacity) desc
limit 1;

prompt:
select t1.country, t2.year, t2.attendance
from stadium as t1
         join match as t13 on t1.stadium_id = t13.stadium_id
         join world_cup as t2 on t13.year = t2.year
order by t2.attendance desc
limit 1;

prompt:
select count(*)

completion: How many players have played so far?

prompt:
select count(mf.substitution_out), p.player_name
from player as p
         join match_fact as mf on p.player_id = mf.player_id
where mf.substitution_out = 1
group by p.player_name
order by count(mf.substitution_out)
        desc
limit 1;
completion: Which player was substituted out the most?

prompt:
select distinct player_name
from player
         join player_fact as pf on player.player_id = pf.player_id
         join national_team as nt on pf.team_id = nt.team_id
         join match_fact as mf on player.player_id = mf.player_id
         join match as m on mf.match_id = m.match_id
where nt.team_initials = 'hun'
  and nt.year = '1954'
  and m.stage = 'final'
  and mf.line_up = 1;
completion: Which players started for the hungarian team in the final of 1954?

prompt:
select distinct player_name
from player
         join player_fact as pf on player.player_id = pf.player_id
         join national_team as nt on pf.team_id = nt.team_id
         join match_fact as mf on player.player_id = mf.player_id
         join match as m on mf.match_id = m.match_id
where nt.teamname = 'germany fr'
  and nt.year = '1954'
  and m.stage = 'final'
  and mf.line_up = '1';
completion: Which players started for the german team in the final of 1954?

prompt:
select distinct player_name
from player
         join player_fact as pf on player.player_id = pf.player_id
         join national_team as nt on pf.team_id = nt.team_id
         join match_fact as mf on player.player_id = mf.player_id
         join match as m on mf.match_id = m.match_id
where nt.teamname = 'germany'
  and nt.year = '2014'
  and m.stage = 'final'
  and mf.line_up = '1';
completion: Which players started for the german team in the final of 2014?

prompt:
select distinct player_name
from player
         join player_fact as pf on player.player_id = pf.player_id
         join national_team as nt on pf.team_id = nt.team_id
         join match_fact as mf on player.player_id = mf.player_id
         join match as m on mf.match_id = m.match_id
where nt.team_initials = 'arg'
  and nt.year = '2014'
  and m.stage = 'final'
  and mf.line_up = '1';

prompt:
select count(goal), stadium_name
from stadium
         join match on stadium.stadium_id = match.stadium_id
         join match_fact on match.match_id = match_fact.match_id
where goal = '1'
group by stadium_name
order by count(goal) desc
limit 1;
completion: In which stadium were the most goals scored?

prompt:
select count(goal), player_name
from player
         join match_fact on player.player_id = match_fact.player_id
where goal = '1'
  and line_up = '0'
group by player_name
order by count(goal) desc
limit 1;
completion: Which player has scored the most goals when being substituted in?

prompt:
select player_name,
       minute
from match_fact
         join player on match_fact.player_id = player.player_id
where goal = '1'
group by player_name,
         minute
order by min(minute)
limit 3;

         player.player_id
order by count(player_name) desc
limit 1;

prompt:
select stadium_name, attendance, nthome.teamname, ntaway.teamname
from match_fact
         join match as m on match_fact.match_id = m.match_id
         join stadium as s on m.stadium_id = s.stadium_id
         join national_team as nthome on m.home_team_id = nthome.team_id
         join national_team as ntaway on m.away_team_id = ntaway.team_id
group by stadium_name, attendance, nthome.teamname, ntaway.teamname
order by min(attendance)
limit 1;
completion: Which match had the lowest attendance?
